title: EZREAL pulsefire icon
body: Hi riot i want to know if the people who already had pulsefire ezreal is gone get that icon of is face because you state to thouse who have the skin should recieve and even so mine have not arrive so i need to wait or this is olny for thouse who buy the skin now cause i have that skin since 2014 i think

replies.body: If you have PF Ezreal then you should get the icon!  There are a lot of eligible players, so it's going to take a bit.  We aim to have have it all done as soon as we can but could take a week.  Hang tight!

Hi

You are eligible to recive the icon, It should be in you inventory around 29.05.

Best of luck!
